website_summaries.verdict: The Ecco Cage Pro brings a lot to the table that delights the majority of its owners. It manages to meet the high expectations of consumers in terms of comfort, quality, and water protection. The spikeless outsole continues to astound many golfers because it provides an equally grippy attribute that is comparable to cleated trainers. The tongue and the removable insoles do not necessarily appeal to some reviewers. But, overall, this item is highly recommended.
pros: Comfort is a typical adjective that many have used in describing the Cage Pro
Stability is one of the stellar features of this golf shoe, according to plenty of testers
It improves the weight shift on one's swing
This spikeless shoe surprises a significant number of users as it delivers traction on different turf conditions
The wide toe room benefits numerous consumers, including those wearing orthotics
Several satisfied buyers promise that this is not the last Ecco golf shoe that they'll buy
Moreover, those that switched brands have not had any regrets in doing so
A lot of purchasers highlight the water protection feature as it is incredibly useful on the course
Plenty of commenters have praised the brand for using quality materials on the Ecco Cage Pro
Though it is quite expensive, many golf fans claim that it is value for money
cons: One of the testers complains about the tongue sticking into the front of the ankle, which causes blisters
Removing the insole may give a wide fit, but it also removes the cushioning that is needed to play rounds, a consumer said

customer_reviews.title: Top quality golf shoes, amazing bargain if you can get for half price, but worth full price anyway!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are so well made. Sturdy but flexible, made using superb premium leather. They instantly feel as comfortable as your favourite slippers. Well stitched tongue adds to the waterproof performance. They are apparently discontinued (2017 vintage) but if you can find a pair I recommend you grab them while you can. Just a tip. I clicked on size 11 (UK), and noticed at check out that this had become 11.5 (Euro 46, US 12.5). I took a gamble and was very pleased I did. Despite being 11.5 on the label they are a very comfortable UK 11 - with a medium width.
customer_reviews.author: Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using them for some weeks now and they are like playing in comfortable trainers. No water ingress and a pleasure to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Pandroid

customer_reviews.title: high quality comfortable golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ecco are my golf shoe of choice, they are high quality, very comfortable, waterproof and very durable, high performance golf shoes. As ever in life you get what you pay for, though on this occasion these were heavily discounted and a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Iley

customer_reviews.title: White not grey
customer_reviews.text: Image indicates that the colour will have a grey/white tone however the shoe was completely white. Spider web grips are ok for Summer but will revert back to traditional golf shoes now the ground is soft.
customer_reviews.author: LondonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Worst golf shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly bad golf shoes. I thought that they were perfect when I got them but am only now starting to wear them. Used 4 times ...so uncomfortable...very hard plastic leading to very bad blisters. Would not recommend these to anyone. So expensive and not as good as Footjoys which I have used for years without any problems...ever!
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Ecco cage golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting shoes very supportive and comfortable, the golf shoes arrived as said and got regular updates on tracking. Got an update on the day of delivery with an 1hr slot and the parcel was delivered right on time. Thanks very much look forward in playing in my new Ecco golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: james collins

customer_reviews.title: and being a right handed golfer this is an area of great pressure. Shoes also looks too long for shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very tight especially on the left hand side of left foot, and being a right handed golfer this is an area of great pressure. Shoes also looks too long for shoe size (42)
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Whippey

customer_reviews.title: Needed a comfortable pair of golf shoes for summer golfing
customer_reviews.text: Needed a comfortable pair of golf shoes for summer golfing, chose these after reading the reviews. Was not disappointed have worn them for several rounds, no blisters just light on the feet and they look smart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product, very soft leather and nice fit. Inner sole inlay can be removed for wider fitting but I’m an 8 uk size and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Deaville

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Totally took the skin off both heals . I paid extra to get a quality comfortable shoe but unfortunately these were very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hay

customer_reviews.title: ... normal size 11 (45) the 46 would have been better!
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a tight fit for a normal size 11 (45) the 46 would have been better!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable Golf shoe from Ecco
customer_reviews.text: Ecco are always comfy and these are no exception. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description
customer_reviews.text: Not mentioned in description that they are a wider fit.Returned as such
customer_reviews.author: D.J. Harland

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of Ecco golf shoes. These fit beautifully and are like slippers. SOle gives good grip. Very happy. The sole is more of a light grey than black. See my photo which shows this.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W

customer_reviews.title: Care - blisters
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I did not buy these shoes via Amazon. I bought these shoes ahead of others as I have trouble with my Achilles Tendon and have been advised to wear supportive shoes. The cage design therefore sounded perfect and ECCO has a reputation for comfortable shoes. Unfortunately both my heels blistered badly and deeply - something which has not happened to me for decades and that includes doing a lot of running and long-distance hill-walking. As others have said, try before you buy and take additional precautions around the heel area e.g. heel shields/ grips. Otherwise the shoes appear as described.
customer_reviews.author: John H

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Golf Cage Pro Shoes
product_meta.description: A hybrid men's golf shoe that looks good and performs flawlessly, this super-lightweight and supple Dritton leather shoe is at the pinnacle of design and functionality. A water-resistant layer keeps feet dry while the anatomical design of the shoe incorporates soft curves that follow the natural contours of your foot. The unique ECCO SPYDR-GRIP outsole is a revolutionary design feature, providing exceptional stability through the use of naturally-placed pivot points.
feature_bullets: One piece direct-injected pu stability cage that wraps from the heel, through the midsole across the toe box
New performance outsole featuring speed-grip an organic design for improved traction on the course
Hydromax leather upper is water resistant which provides excellent breathability and durability
Removable insole allows wearer to adjust width (extra width option)
Organic structure outsole design that is soft on greens and delivers unique ecco comfort
